# to-string
stringify

## usage

    var toString = require('to-string')

    toString(maybeAValue)
    // => String

    toStringOrUndefined(4)
    // => '4'

    toString.orUndefined(undefined)
    // => undefined


## installation

    $ npm install to-string


## running the tests

From package root:

    $ npm install
    $ npm test
